title: Anheuser-Busch
summary: Anheuser-Busch Companies, LLC[5] /ˈænhaɪzər ˈbʊʃ/ is an American brewing company headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri.[6] Since 2008, it has been a wholly owned subsidiary of Anheuser-Busch InBev (AB InBev)[7][6] which also has its North American regional management headquarters in St. Louis.[7][8]
